DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the midterm clinical evaluation, biological parameters and immune reconstitution after Rituximab treatment for Pemphigus.
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Clinical and Biological Evaluation of Patients With Severe Forms of Pemphigus Treated by Rituximab
DOC.criteria: age>18 consentment patient treated with Rituximab and included in clinical trial n°2002/020/HP NCT00213512 "Treatment of Patients Presenting Pemphigus With Anti CD20 (Mabthera)". age < 18 no consentment
